official_title: To establish the Spring Mountain National Recreation Area in Nevada, and for other purposes.
short_title: Spring Mountains National Recreation Area Act

summary.text: Spring Mountains National Recreation Area Act - Establishes the Spring Mountains National Recreation Area in Nevada. Requires the Secretary of Agriculture (Secretary) to develop a general management plan for the Area as an amendment to the Toiyabe National Forest Land and Resource Management Plan. Requires inclusion in the plan of any Bureau of Land Management recommendations as to the suitability or nonsuitability of specified wilderness study areas for preservation as wilderness. Directs the Secretary, acting through the Chief of the Forest Service, to manage the lands and waters within the wilderness study areas to maintain their potential for inclusion within the National Wilderness Preservation System, pending submission of such recommendation and until otherwise directed by an Act of the Congress. Withdraws all Federal lands within the Area and lands, waters, and interests in such Area acquired by the United States after the enactment of this Act from public land and mining laws (including mineral and geothermal leasing). Authorizes appropriations.
